channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Capital One Spark Miles for Business credit card review: Double miles on everything
item.description: Here's why this card might be a great fit for your business needs.

item.title: Amex Platinum vs. Chase Sapphire Reserve: Which premium travel card is right for you?
item.description: Here's a look at the perks and benefits of The Platinum Card from American Express and the Chase Sapphire Reserve to see which card may be best for yo...

item.title: Our favorite American Express Fine Hotels + Resorts properties where you can get elite perks
item.description: TPG rounds up some of our favorite boutique and luxury hotels to book using American Express Fine Hotels + Resorts, which offers elitelike benefits.

item.title: Delta to drop Geneva, Switzerland, as transatlantic travel shifts
item.description: Delta Air Lines is ending flights to Geneva as European demand slows and shifts.
